entry.title: Elevated error rate
entry.content:
Jun 30, 15:19 UTC
Resolved - Connection to 3rd party services have improved and system is performing well again.

We will continue to monitor the system.

Jun 30, 15:15 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 30, 14:51 UTC
Investigating - Continuing to see high error rates. Investigating root cause.

We suspect it's a connection to an outside service, but working to bottleneck it.

Jun 30, 14:37 UTC
Monitoring - Error rate has gone down. http://cl.ly/2u1D0e1g0E2b

Jun 30, 14:32 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an elevated error rate connecting to GitHub. We are investigating the root cause...

entry.title: Upgrading Backend
entry.content:
Jun 13, 02:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 12, 23:43 UTC
Update - Our backend improvements are operating well. Continuing to monitor system.

Jun 12, 22:49 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 12, 22:49 UTC
Scheduled - We will be upgrading out backend tonight. There may be outages as we transition to some new infrastructure.

Thank you for your patience.

entry.title: Emergency database maintenance
entry.content:
May 7, 20:47 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 7, 19:21 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

entry.title: Migration Issues
entry.content:
Apr 28, 20:46 UTC
Resolved - Majority of product has been stable for a while. Minor issues still being worked out. Thank you!

Apr 27, 11:04 UTC
Monitoring - Database is healthier, still seemingly random issues (see below). Overall we are seeing good web requests. Some projects are having issues with statuses which we are fixing now.


#### Database issues
- `FATAL: the database system is in recovery mode`
- `SSL SYSCALL error: EOF detected`
- `server closed the connection unexpectedly. This probably means the server terminated abnormally before or while processing the request`

Still trying to figure out whats causing these issues. Thank you!

Apr 27, 01:08 UTC
Investigating - We are still investigating database issues with Heroku staff. Thank you for your patience.

We will work our hardest to get the full app stabilized asap. Everyone has been so kind and chill, thank you so much :)

Apr 26, 12:50 UTC
Update - We have a couple issues still, but most app is functional. Thanks for hanging in there!

1. Some project are not posting statuses/comments
2. There is a lingering database issue `unexpected chunk number` which had dumbfounded us. Chatting with Heroku PG team to get more insight into what is going on.

Thank you so much! We are almost at greener pastures.

Apr 26, 08:42 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work hard on migration issues. Your patience is well respected.

There are several issues we are overcoming: database producing odd errors, files leaking on to disk and more.

We promise to overcome these rough waters so can all sail smooth together. Thank you!

Apr 25, 13:22 UTC
Update - Thank you everyone for your patience! Working hard at getting everything stabilized. <3

Apr 24, 18:08 UTC
Identified - A number of issues from migration that we are working through. Your patience is very much appreciated.

Our new release is very exciting and we are thrilled to have you part of the journey. Once we get through a couple speed bumps
we'll be full throttle again!

Thank you,
Steve

entry.title: App not reachable
entry.content:
Apr 27, 00:14 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 27, 00:11 UTC
Identified - DNS not able to resolve. Updating servers

Apr 27, 00:06 UTC
Investigating - The app is no longer reachable for an unknown reason.

entry.title: Major Release - V4
entry.content:
Apr 24, 18:09 UTC
Completed - Moving to fixing issues now.

Apr 24, 16:00 UTC
Verifying - v4 is live, we are tracking a couple issue. Thank you!

Apr 24, 13:19 UTC
Update - Getting closer! http://cl.ly/410Y2A45432Y Thank you again for your patience.

Apr 24, 10:44 UTC
Update - Database migrations underway. We appreciate your patience and will be back shortly.

Apr 24, 08:18 UTC
In progress - We will be suspending service while we migrate our system. Thank you for your patience :)

Mar 27, 14:40 UTC
Scheduled - We have been working very hard on our next major release. If all goes well we plan to release it very soon!

This Scheduled Maintenance may change based on when we are prepared for the migration. During which time *all* services will be stopped for a period of time while we upgrade our entire infrastructure.

Thank you!

entry.title: Database Maintenance
entry.content:
Mar 27, 16:15 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 27, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 27, 14:37 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing some small database changes to speed up our backend and prepare for our next major release. Thank you for your patience.

entry.title: Uploading reports to S3 issue
entry.content:
Dec 7, 23:20 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 7, 18:18 UTC
Monitoring - Uploads to S3 are showing a successful upload but are returning 404's. It seems to have been temporary.

Dec 7, 18:01 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports about uploads that are not being found on S3.

entry.title: Connection to Redis issue
entry.content:
Nov 11, 15:38 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 11, 12:28 UTC
Monitoring - Worker processes failed to connect to Redis causing a large queue of tasks. Working through them now.

entry.title: Heroku Platform Error
entry.content:
Oct 21, 12:41 UTC
Resolved - Heroku is back online.

Oct 21, 10:35 UTC
Identified - https://status.heroku.com/incidents/820

Oct 21, 10:31 UTC
Investigating - An unexpected platform error is occuring...

entry.title: Elevated error rate
entry.content:
Sep 23, 15:52 UTC
Resolved - We have identified a method in our system that has caused issues process. We have throttled that endpoint and will deploy fixes shortly. Meanwhile the app is back to operating normally.

Sep 23, 15:49 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 23, 15:45 UTC
Investigating - Our service is experiencing an elevated number of errors. Inspecting cause of issue.

entry.title: Database not responding
entry.content:
Sep 22, 13:04 UTC
Resolved - Database is back online. Will reply with resolution from Heroku staff.

Sep 22, 12:15 UTC
Monitoring - Our database is back online. Following up with @heroku staff to understand what happened.

We received an email at 2015-09-22 11:08:28 UTC from Heroku's automated system stating: "This is likely due to an underlying hardware or network failure and not something caused by your application." The database was offline till 2015-09-22 11:38:40 UTC. During this time all traffic and reports resulted in HTTP 500/502 errors.

The database then went offline again about 5 minutes.

Heroku staff will be presenting more information on why the database suddenly went offline.

Sep 22, 12:09 UTC
Investigating - Database still not preforming properly.

Sep 22, 11:44 UTC
Monitoring - Heroku has brought the database back online. Monitoring services...

Sep 22, 11:35 UTC
Investigating - Creating a new database to work off. Heroku has identified the issue.

Sep 22, 11:19 UTC
Identified - Our database is not accepting traffic and is unresponsive. Contacting Heroku support for resolution. Thank you

entry.title: Heroku web connection issue
entry.content:
Sep 8, 00:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 7, 22:15 UTC
Monitoring - Dyno connections appear back to normal.

Sep 7, 21:51 UTC
Investigating - Our dynos are showing elevated error rate. May be Heroku issue...

entry.title: High error rate of unknown origin.
entry.content:
Aug 25, 19:40 UTC
Resolved - Slow API calls hung up our servers.

Aug 25, 17:57 UTC
Monitoring - Systems appear back to normal. Still looking for root cause of outage.

Aug 25, 17:52 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Redis server died
entry.content:
Aug 24, 00:06 UTC
Resolved - System is back to normal. Continuing to monitor our Redis connection.

Aug 24, 00:01 UTC
Update - Our provider Redis Labs at AWS/us-east-1-3.1 is experiencing issues. We have since switched to a different Redis instance.

Aug 23, 23:47 UTC
Monitoring - We have switched service providers and are monitoring the connection.

Aug 23, 23:44 UTC
Identified - Our Redis instance has died. Seeking alternative connection....

entry.title: Unable to retrieve Bash uploader
entry.content:
Aug 15, 15:48 UTC
Resolved - Our bash uploader via https://codecov.io/bash returned a 400 error due to a faulty Github oauth token that unexpectedly returned Bad Credentials when attempting to retrieve the uploading script from Github. We are uncertain how this happened but have added a fail-safe to our backend to avoid this issue in the future. We apologize the inconvenience this may have caused.

entry.title: Failure to connect to RabbitMQ provider
entry.content:
Aug 14, 21:30 UTC
Resolved - Connection to our RabbitMQ server failed and the result was a number of reports not able to be processed. Connecting to our RabbitMQ provider continued to fail for an over and hour with no explanation. Therefore, we switched our provider to CloudAMQP.
